full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZAB MO STONG PA NYID KYI LTA BA LA LOG RTOG 'GOG PAR BYED PA'I BSTAN BCOS LTA BA NGAN PA'I MUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO SH'AKYA MCHOG LDAN DANG, GO BO RAB 'BYAMS PA BSOD NAMS SENG GE PA RNAM GNYIS LA GDAMS PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @277B CES ZAB MO STONG PA NYID KYI LTA BA LA LOG RTOG 'GOG PAR BYED PA'I BSTAN BCOS LTA NGAN MUN SEL SHES BYA BA @278A *, ,RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS DANG DBYER MED PA'I DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I 'PHRO CUNG ZAD LUS 'DUG PA 'PHROS LUS PA MI MDZES PAR 'DUG PAS, LUS KHYOD KYIS GYIS SHIG CES, SA SKYONG MI'I DBANG PO RIG GNAS MTHA' DAG LA MKHYEN PA RGYAS SHING BSOD NAMS CHEN PO LA MNGA' BSGYUR BA'I CHOS RGYAL CHEN PO BKRA SHIS KYI MTSAN CAN GYIS BKA' LUNG NAN CHER GNANG BA DANG, ,SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA DU MAS KYAS DE LTAR GYIS SHIG CES GSUNGS PA RNAMS DANG DU BLANGS TE, ,DBU MA'I GZHUNG LUGS MANG DU THOS SHING BLA MA DAM PA'I BKA' DRIN LAS 'PHAGS PA YAB SRAS KYI LUNG BZANG LA DAD PA THOB PA'I SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BDE LEGS NYI MAS 'PHAGS PA 'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG GI GNAS, ,PHANG PHONG KHAR SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG 'GRO BA MTHA' DAG LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,, KHU RE CHEN MO'I 'DUL KHRIMS GTZANG BRUNG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN GLING DRVA TSANG GI PAR KHANG DU BZHUGS, ,
